steps.title: Prepare Ingredients
steps.description: Leftover picnic or ham bone. Prepare Bouquet Garni: tie allspice, peppercorns and bay leaf in a cheesecloth bag.

steps.title: Cooking
steps.description: In 4-quart Dutch oven or saucepot, heat leftover picnic or ham bone, peas, carrots, onion and 7 cups water to boiling.

steps.title: Simmer Soup
steps.description: Add Bouquet Garni to split-pea mixture. Reduce heat; cover and simmer 45 minutes or until peas are tender.

steps.title: Finish Soup
steps.description: Discard Bouquet Garni. Add salt to taste. Remove bone from soup; cut any meat from bone and return to soup. Discard bone. (Add more water to reheat, if you like.)
